item.title: Notes on OpenAI DevDay
item.description: OpenAI DevDay One sentence summary GPT-4 Turbo with 128K context Cheaper, longer, more accurate for devs Function call improved. but no exact numbers. Assistants API → (build agency into your app) Access it from your App (language based data analysis app, a coding assistant, an AI-powered vacation planner, a voice-controlled DJ, a smart visual canvas) Retrieval → kills embedding Code interpreter (no internet container) function calling Understand more: https://platform.openai.com/docs/assistants/overview Custom GPTs (agency) Access it from ChatGPT.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog First off, I am human who occasionally wonders if our world might be more akin to a computer program than we realize. Don’t be alarmed, it’s merely a philosophical pondering, not a declaration of eccentricity. I can imagine a day when AI might start write its own blog. Yet, let’s not stray too far into the AI. The matter at hand is my own foray into blogging, inspired by Lilian Weng’s blog.
